title: Chaos Walking: The Complete Trilogy: Books 1-3
description: Read it before you see it! The astonishing series by Patrick Ness that inspired a major motion picture--now in one ready-to-devour boxed set. Dubbed by Publishers Weekly "one of the most important works of young adult science fiction in recent years," the Chaos Walking trilogy includes three highly acclaimed novels, in paperback:  - The Knife of Never Letting Go- The Ask and the Answer- Monsters of Men
author: Patrick Ness
